actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce from age 65 to age 62 the eligibility requirement for the exclusion of a certain portion of the gain from the sale of a principal residence.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to lower from 65 to 62 the age requirement for the exclusion of gain on the sale or exchange of the taxpayer's principal residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce from age 65 to age 62 the eligibility requirement for the exclusion of a certain portion of the gain from the sale of a principal residence.
